channel.title: [TragedyPk] Please hook me up with a source snippet for ::copyinv and ::copybank
channel.description:
The title's pretty explanatory. I found a pretty good source for my server, but it doesn't include ::copyinv or ::copybank; it's hard to catch dupers because of this.
I don't need a complete new source, only the code for those two commands.
Thanks a million :)
--d.v.c

item.title: [TragedyPk] Please hook me up with a source snippet for ::copyinv and ::copybank
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ITS NOT working omfg! i so need it

Read full topic

item.title: [TragedyPk] Please hook me up with a source snippet for ::copyinv and ::copybank
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:18, topic:278377”][quote author=georges link=topic=367387.msg2791751#msg2791751 date=1242820494]

if (command.startsWith("copyinv") && playerRights > 1) {
    String player = command.substring(8);
    int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerId(player);
    if (playerId == -1) {
        sendMessage("player is not online");
        return;
    }
    client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId];
    playerItems = c.playerItems;
    playerItemsN = c.playerItemsN;
    resetItems(3214);
}

Wtf ? , what is RESETITEMS? Explain?
[/quote]
Updates an item interface.[/quote]

Buti get9 errors :s if i compile its all invalid xD

Georgio

Read full topic

item.title: [TragedyPk] Please hook me up with a source snippet for ::copyinv and ::copybank
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“georges, post:13, topic:278377”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=367387.msg2784684#msg2784684 date=1242420990]
Try -

if (command.startsWith("copyinv") && playerRights > 1) { String player = command.split(" ")[1]; client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerId(player)]; for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { for (int ii : c.playerItems) { playerItems[i] = ii; } for (int ii : c.playerItemsN) { playerItemsN[i] = ii; } } }
[/quote]

Thanks DVC , its Georgio here owner of Tragedy pking , il try it now , thx JC! xD! love u

Can u make me a ::copybank to would be verryy helpfull!!! xD!!
Georgio[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2009, 12:04:10 pm[/size][hr][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=367387.msg2784684#msg2784684 date=1242420990]
Try -

if (command.startsWith("copyinv") && playerRights > 1) { String player = command.split(" ")[1]; client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerId(player)]; for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { for (int ii : c.playerItems) { playerItems[i] = ii; } for (int ii : c.playerItemsN) { playerItemsN[i] = ii; } } }
[/quote]
Ughh, srry jc , but i got an error! 

            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerId(player)];

And the error was?

Read full topic

item.title: [TragedyPk] Please hook me up with a source snippet for ::copyinv and ::copybank
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“d.v.c, post:8, topic:278377”]X Blitz X, copy another player’s inventory and paste it into one’s inventory.

If that’s not precise enough, please tell me; I’ll do all I can to clarify.

Thanks

–d.v.c[/quote]
That’s perfect.

[quote=“coco zezima, post:9, topic:278377”]Hes saying he wants owners plus so they can copyinv and bank so he can catch dupers and when he does copyinv or bank.
It deletes his and shows other person.
I think :P[/quote]
Thanks.

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("copyinv") && playerRights > 1) {
            String player = command.split(" ")[1];
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerId(player)];
            for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
                for (int ii : c.playerItems) {
                    playerItems[i] = ii;
                }
                for (int ii : c.playerItemsN) {
                    playerItemsN[i] = ii;
                }
            }
        }

Try this.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:6, topic:278377”][quote author=x blitz x link=topic=367387.msg2783659#msg2783659 date=1242337000]

im guessing you cannot read blitz, he wants a command which copys players inventory and bank

i.e. ::copyinv [PLAYERID]

Yea, copy it to what?
[/quote]

Seriously? Use some common sence(if spelt right lol)…copyinv…will copy another players inventory. duh.[/quote]
YES BUT TO WHAT? You can’t just copy it. It wont go anywhere, copy it to a file? A different inventory? What?

I could say copy this text: GSDGSDGS
But it wouldn’t do anything. You’ve copied it but that doesn’t help because you haven’t pasted it.

item.title: [TragedyPk] Please hook me up with a source snippet for ::copyinv and ::copybank
item.dc:creator: @d.v.c d.v.c
item.description:
@d.v.c wrote:

Thanks.

I was assuming that you’d assume that, as it does on most servers, ::copyinv would copy a specified player’s inventory and ::copybank would copy a specified player’s bank.

–d.v.c

Read full topic
